title: Bob Evans Natural Homestyle Classic Mashed Potatoes - BOB EVANS FARMS, LLC
description: Help yourself to a scoop of deliciousness. Our Natural Homestyle Classic Mashed Potatoes are made with russet potatoes, real milk, butter, and sea salt. With no artificial coloring or flavors, it's also microwave ready in just minutes and convenient.
